description: Creates a token that can be used to authenticate and authorize Grafana HTTP API operations for the given workspace service account. The service account acts as a user for the API operations, and defines the permissions that are used by the API. Service accounts are only available for workspaces that are compatible with Grafana version 9 and above.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A name for the token to create.

parameters.name: secondsToLive
parameters.description: Sets how long the token will be valid, in seconds. You can set the time up to 30 days in the future.

parameters.name: serviceAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the service account for which to create a token.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace the service account resides within.

nested_items.name: serviceAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the service account where the token was created.

nested_items.name: serviceAccountToken
nested_items.description: Information about the created token, including the key. Be sure to store the key securely.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service account token.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key for the service account token. Used when making calls to the Grafana HTTP APIs to authenticate and authorize the requests.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service account token.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the workspace where the token was created.
